data.title: bbgi.com Alexa排名:913203 BBGI
data.text:
抓取时间:2014年09月17日 17:56:07

网址:http://bbgi.com/

标题:BBGI

关键字:

描述:Owns and operates radio stations in eight states. (Nasdaq: BBGI).

主体:

Toggle navigation Home About About Our Story Our Team Our Community Service Our Industry Stations Stations Advertise With Us Digital Press Financial Company Station Investors Board of Directors Stock Quote SEC Filings Corporate Governance Shareholder Info WEBCASTS / PRESENTATIONS Contact Us X 44 Radio Stations Our 28 FM and 16 AM stations deliver news, entertainment and a variety of musical genres to consumers and advertisers in eleven large- and mid-sized markets across America. Check out our stations here. Radio. Digital. Events. Results. Beasley Broadcast Group Inc. iRadioNOW It’s current, it’s innovative, it’s NOW! Beasley’s free app, iRadioNOW brings popular Beasley Broadcast stations from across the country to your phone. Looking for Rhythmic, Urban, or Contemporary Hit Radio? Religious/Gospel, Country, or News-Talk-Sports? Rock – from Classic to Active to Alternative to Oldies? You’ll find it all on some of America’s hottest radio stations like Miami’s Power 96, Philly’s 92.5XTU and Wired 96.5, Las Vegas’ 96.3 KKLZ and dozens more. Free Radio On My Phone Today’s smartphones already have an FM receiver. This means that all listeners would have easy access to radio for the entertainment they love and information they need if FM chips were activated in every smartphone! FM radio doesn’t require an internet connection and won’t drain your phone’s battery. If you want to learn more about how your smartphone – in the case of an emergency – becomes your lifeline, visit http://freeradioonmyphone.org/. HD Radio® Technology No static. No hiss. Only the good stuff. HD Radio® Technology has the best selection of local radio with amazing features and no monthly fees. HD Radio® stations broadcast in clear digital quality to your local area making static, radio hiss and fuzz a thing of the past. And radio never looked so good; Artist Experience® enables HD Radio receivers to display song titles and album art, along with station logos and information. . 6.2 Million On-Air Listeners Weekly. Latest News Beasley Broadcast announced the 2014 winners of it’s annual operating awards. Congratulations to all the winners: · WXKB-FM – Radio Station of the Year / Fort Myers-Naples, FL · Brad Beasley – General Manager of the Year / Fort Myers-Naples, FL · Donna Williams – Business Manager of the Year / Augusta, GA · AJ Lurie – Sales Manager of the Year / Fort Myers-Naples, FL · Tee Gentry – Program Director of the Year / Augusta, GA · Lamar Smith – Engineer of the Year / Las Vegas, NV · Natalie Conner– CEO Award of Excellence/ Executive Vice President Welcome to Beasley Broadcast Group... offering music, news, information and entertainment to over 6.2 million listeners weekly from 44 stations in eleven radio markets across the United States. In each of our markets, we aim to provide the very best radio experience to both listeners and advertisers. From entertaining formats to exciting promoti
